channel.title: Project Insanity objects : 2x2 and larger problem
channel.description:
Well , i'm sure the lot of you have faced this problem ; you want to make it so that a staircase takes you up / down , but then you realize that you have to stand adjacent to the coordinate where the object is placed , and not all around the object. Objects who only take up 1 or 2 spaces don't have this problem.
now , how would i handle this problem? i tried the inArea method , didn't work...
